explanation:
We have unlocked the secure portal for you to view available egg donors. Per Indian law, photos are not shown to protect anonymity, but you will see: 
1. Physical features (Height, Skin tone, Eye color) 
2. Education & Profession 
3. Family Medical History.
next_steps: Login at [Link] using Password: {{password}}.
reassurance: All donors are medically screened for genetic diseases and infections.

explanation: I know looking at a list of traits feels strange. Focus on medical history and physical resemblance to yourself.
next_steps: Don't rush. Take the weekend.
reassurance: Success rates with these donors are very high (60-70%) because they are young (21-25 years old).
call_to_action: Call me when you have a shortlist.

explanation: Aap link par jakar donors ki details dekh sakte hain (Height, Colour, Padhai). Photo allowed nahi hai government rules ke hisaab se.
next_steps: Jo profile aapko apne se milti-julti lage, use select karein.
reassurance: Sabhi donors healthy aur young hain.

explanation:
Based on your photo, we found a donor with similar facial structure and skin tone. 
**Donor Code:** {{donor_code}} 
**Education:** Masters Degree 
**Height:** 5'5"
next_steps: Her cycle can start immediately.
reassurance: She has donated before and resulted in a pregnancy.

explanation: We prioritize blood group matching first, then physical features. We have a donor who is {{blood_group}} like you.
next_steps: We can reserve her for your cycle.
reassurance: She is an excellent candidate.

explanation: We need to sync your period with the donor. You will take birth control pills for 10 days so you both bleed at the same time.
next_steps: When she starts injections, you start Estrogen to build lining.
reassurance: This ensures your uterus is ready exactly when her eggs are retrieved.

explanation: Your donor started stimulation today. We expect retrieval in 10-12 days.
next_steps: Please start your Progynova 2mg tablets now.
reassurance: We are monitoring her closely to get the best eggs for you.

explanation: Donor ke injections shuru ho gaye hain. Aapko apni lining banani hai ab.
next_steps: Tablets time pe lein.
reassurance: Hum donor ko daily monitor kar rahe hain.

explanation: Instead of waiting 2 months for a fresh cycle, we can use Frozen Eggs from our bank immediately.
next_steps: Advantage: No syncing needed. We just prepare your lining and thaw eggs.
reassurance: Success rates are nearly identical to fresh cycles.
call_to_action: Want to switch to frozen? It saves time.

explanation: Agar aap jaldi karna chahte hain, toh hum Bank se already frozen eggs le sakte hain.
next_steps: Wait nahi karna padega.
reassurance: Quality guarantee hoti hai (6-8 eggs minimum).

explanation: Batch of 6 eggs allotted to you from Donor {{donor_code}}.
next_steps: Thawing planned for {{date}}.
reassurance: High quality verified.

explanation: Under the ART Act, using a friend/relative is permitted but requires strict legal counseling to establish that no money is being exchanged (Altruistic).
next_steps: We need to screen her medically first (AMH, Genetics).
reassurance: Using a sister helps maintain a genetic link to the family.

explanation: We need an affidavit stating the donation is voluntary and unpaid.
next_steps: Please sign the forms with your donor.
reassurance: We handle the paperwork.

explanation: Agar aapki behen eggs donate kar rahi hai, toh medical tests same honge.
next_steps: Unka AMH check karna padega.
reassurance: Genetic link family mein hi rahega.

explanation: Since Indian banks primarily have Indian ethnicity, we can import frozen eggs from International Banks (e.g., Cryos).
next_steps: This involves import permits and higher costs (approx ‚Çπ3-5L extra).
reassurance: We handle the customs clearance.

explanation: The shipment takes about 3 weeks to clear customs.
next_steps: You need to select the donor from the international website today.
reassurance: The survival rate of imported vitrified eggs is excellent.

explanation:
Our bank has screened donors sorted by: 
1. Height 
2. Education (IIT/Medical/MBA) 
3. Skin tone.
next_steps: Select 2-3 preferences.
reassurance: All donors are tested for HIV/Hepatitis/Thalassemia.

explanation: Since your husband has Azoospermia, we will use donor sperm. We try to match his physical characteristics so the child blends in with the family.
next_steps: Do you want a donor with a specific blood group?
reassurance: The child will know you as the father. Biology is secondary to parenting.

explanation: Humne aapke husband ki height aur features se milta hua donor dhund liya hai.
next_steps: Sample ready hai IVF ke liye.
reassurance: Identity confidential rahegi.

explanation: We ONLY use Frozen Donor Sperm. Why? Because it allows for a 6-month quarantine to ensure the donor has no hidden infections like HIV.
next_steps: Fresh donor sperm is not safe/legal.
reassurance: Frozen sperm works perfectly for ICSI.

explanation: Using frozen sample (quarantined 6 months).
next_steps: Ready for fertilization.
reassurance: Disease free.

explanation: If you bring your own donor, we still need to freeze the sample and quarantine it for 6 months (or do nucleic acid testing) to ensure safety.
next_steps: He needs to come for screening.
reassurance: Legal contracts are mandatory to waive his parental rights.

explanation: Your donor's infectious disease screen came back negative.
next_steps: We will freeze his sample today.
reassurance: All legal forms must be signed before usage.

explanation: Since you are using donor sperm, you have the freedom to choose traits! (Height, Education, etc).
next_steps: We will do IUI or IVF depending on your tube status.
reassurance: We support all families here.

explanation: It takes courage to do this alone. We are here to support you.
next_steps: Select a donor. We recommend IVF to bank embryos for a future sibling too.
reassurance: You will be a great mom.

explanation: Aap single parent ban rahi hain, ye bohot badi baat hai. Donor select karte waqt medical history sabse zaroori hai.
next_steps: Hum aapko best verified donors dikhayenge.
reassurance: Society badal rahi hai. Be confident.

explanation: This option involves using embryos donated by another couple who has completed their family. It is like 'adoption' but you carry the pregnancy.
next_steps: The cost is significantly lower (approx ‚Çπ50k-80k) as IVF steps are done.
reassurance: The child grows in your womb, hears your heartbeat. You are the mother.
call_to_action: Is this an option you'd consider?

explanation: We match you with embryos based on blood group and physical traits.
next_steps: No injections for egg retrieval needed. Just lining preparation.
reassurance: Fastest and most affordable route to pregnancy.

explanation: Ye un couples ke liye hai jo dono eggs aur sperm donor chahte hain. Isme bana-banaya embryo transfer hota hai.
next_steps: Cost kam hai aur success rate achha hai.
reassurance: Bachha aap hi janam denge.

explanation: The couple donating the embryos remains anonymous to you, and you remain anonymous to them.
next_steps: We screen them for all diseases before accepting the donation.
reassurance: No future legal claims can be made by donors.

explanation: You asked if you can see photos of the embryo donors. By law, we cannot share photos of the donating couple.
next_steps: We match based on height/skin tone listed in the file.
reassurance: Trust our matching process.

explanation: Embryo donation cycles have a 40-50% success rate per transfer.
next_steps: Prepare lining.
reassurance: These embryos come from couples who successfully had babies, so they are proven fertile.

explanation: Kyunki ye embryos healthy couples se aate hain, success chance high rehta hai.
next_steps: Plan transfer.
reassurance: Bohot achha option hai.

explanation: Success rate approx 50%.
next_steps: Proven fertility embryos.
reassurance: Good choice.

explanation: I must clarify that Commercial Surrogacy (paying a surrogate) is ILLEGAL in India. We only perform 'Altruistic Surrogacy'.
next_steps: This means the surrogate must be a relative/friend who does this out of love. We can pay for medicals and insurance, but no 'fee'.
reassurance: This law protects both you and the surrogate from exploitation.
call_to_action: Do you have a relative willing to carry?

explanation:
Requirements: 
1. Intending couple must be legally married for 5 years. 
2. Wife age 25-50, Husband 26-55. 
3. Medical certificate of infertility required.
next_steps: Surrogate must be: Married, has own child, age 25-35, related to you.
reassurance: We guide you through the District Medical Board approval.

explanation: India mein ab paise dekar surrogacy mana hai. Koi rishtedaar hi surrogate ban sakti hai.
next_steps: Hume District Board se permission leni padegi.
reassurance: Agar aapke paas koi relative taiyar hai, toh hum process shuru kar sakte hain.

explanation: We need to check your surrogate's uterine health and general fitness.
next_steps: Tests: Hysteroscopy, Blood sugar, BP, Psychological evaluation.
reassurance: We must ensure she is safe to carry a pregnancy.
call_to_action: Bring her on Day 2 of period.

explanation: Your cousin has cleared the medical screening. Her lining looks great.
next_steps: Now we apply for the 'Certificate of Essentiality' from the government board.
reassurance: She is a good candidate.

explanation: We are starting estrogen for the surrogate to build her lining.
next_steps: We will transfer YOUR frozen embryo into HER uterus on {{transfer_date}}.
reassurance: We treat her like our own patient.

explanation: Surrogate ki lining ready hai (9mm).
next_steps: Transfer Monday ko hoga.
reassurance: Sab theek hai.

explanation: The surrogate is PREGNANT! Beta hCG: {{beta_value}}.
next_steps: First scan in 2 weeks. She is continuing meds.
reassurance: She is feeling well.

explanation: Aapki surrogate pregnant hai! Test positive aaya hai.
next_steps: Abhi unhe rest karne dein.
reassurance: Baby safe hai.

explanation: Under the ART Act, the donor's identity is sealed. You will never meet them, and they will never know you.
next_steps: This prevents any future custody battles.
reassurance: It makes the legal parentage clear: YOU are the parents.

explanation: Donor identity is strictly confidential. No meeting allowed.
next_steps: We maintain medical records for 10 years if needed for medical emergencies.
reassurance: Secure process.

explanation: This contract states that the donor relinquishes all rights to the eggs/sperm. Any child born is legally yours.
next_steps: Both partners must sign.
reassurance: This document is legally binding in court.

explanation: Please sign the 'Informed Consent for Donor Cycle'.
next_steps: It confirms you accept the donor and take responsibility for the child.
reassurance: Standard procedure.

explanation: Many parents worry: 'Should I tell my child they are donor conceived?'.
next_steps: Current psychology recommends telling them early (age 4-5) as a simple story, rather than a secret revealed later.
reassurance: Honesty builds trust. We have storybooks to help explain this.
call_to_action: Do you want to see the books?

explanation: You can say: 'Mommy and Daddy needed a little help, so a kind person gave us a seed'.
next_steps: Make it part of their birth story.
reassurance: Secrets cause shame; truth causes love.

explanation: Psychologists kehte hain ki bachpan mein hi bata dena behtar hai ki 'Donor' ki help li thi.
next_steps: Isse bachha bada hokar dhokha feel nahi karta.
reassurance: Wo aapko hi apna parent maanega.

explanation: Moving to donor eggs means grieving the child that would have had your eyes. That is a real loss.
next_steps: But Epigenetics means your womb turns the genes on and off. You influence the baby's health.
reassurance: You are the mother. Biology is just the blueprint; you are the builder.

explanation: It's okay to feel sad about needing a donor. But remember, love makes a family, not DNA.
next_steps: Focus on the destination: A baby in your arms.
reassurance: Thousands of our patients have walked this path and are happily parenting now.
